item.title: Synthesizing Tiered VPC in Terraform
item.description: Today’s Mathematics Dynamic VPC x Tiered Subnet Calculator = Tiered VPC Observing Abstractions In hindsight, the Dynamic VPC module should instead be called Simple VPC. It provides a general VPC tier including a public subnet (/24), a private subnet (/24) and NAT Gateways per AZ. The interface is simple because there is minimal focus on subnetting due to the internal subnet generation. Routing is automatic and the module outputs can be consumed for peering.
